direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods remove elements from the list, but one removes by index and the other by object reference.
Both methods handle the removal of multiple elements, but one removes a single element and the other a collection of elements.
Both methods involve removing elements based on a condition, but one uses a predicate and the other a direct object reference.
Both methods modify the list by removing elements, but retainAll keeps only the elements in the specified collection.
Both methods affect the list's contents, but clear removes all elements while remove removes a specific element.
Both methods modify the list, but set replaces an element at a specific index while remove removes an element.
Both methods modify the list, but add inserts an element while remove deletes one.
Both methods modify the list, but addAll inserts multiple elements while remove deletes one.
